   19: %%
   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(ssl_eqc_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: %% Common test
   27: -export([all/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1,
   29:          init_per_testcase/2,
   30:          end_per_suite/1,
   31:          end_per_testcase/2
   32:         ]).
   33: 
   34: %% Test cases
   35: -export([tls_handshake_encoding/1,
   36:          tls_cipher_suite_names/1,
   37:          tls_cipher_openssl_suite_names/1,
   38:          tls_anon_cipher_suite_names/1,
   39:          tls_anon_cipher_openssl_suite_names/1,
   40:          tls_signature_algs/1,
   41:          tls_unorded_chains/1,
   42:          tls_extraneous_chain/1,
   43:          tls_extraneous_chains/1,
   44:          tls_extraneous_and_unorder_chains/1,
   45:          tls_client_cert_auth/1
   46:          ]).
   47: 
   48: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   49: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   50: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   51: 
   52: all() -> 
   53:     [
   54:      tls_handshake_encoding,
   55:      tls_cipher_suite_names,
   56:      tls_cipher_openssl_suite_names,
   57:      tls_anon_cipher_suite_names,
   58:      tls_anon_cipher_openssl_suite_names,
   59:      tls_signature_algs,
   60:      tls_unorded_chains,
   61:      tls_extraneous_chain,
   62:      tls_extraneous_chains,
   63:      tls_extraneous_and_unorder_chains,
   64:      tls_client_cert_auth
   65:     ].
   66: 
   67: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   68: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   69:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 20}),
   70:     catch crypto:stop(),
   71:     try crypto:start() of
   72: 	ok ->
   73:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
   74:             ct_property_test:init_per_suite(Config)
   75:     catch _:_ ->
   76: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
   77:     end.
   78: 
   79: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   80:     ssl:stop(),
   81:     application:stop(crypto).
   82: 
   83: init_per_testcase(_, Config0) ->
   84:     Config0.
   85: 
   86: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   87:     Config.
   88: 
   89: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   90: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   91: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   92: 
   93: tls_handshake_encoding(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   94:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_handshake:prop_tls_hs_encode_decode()).
   95:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_handshake:prop_tls_hs_encode_decode(),
   96:                                         Config).
   97: 
   98: tls_cipher_suite_names(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   99:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_cipher_suite_rfc_name()).
  100:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_cipher_suite_rfc_name(),
  101:                                         Config).
  102: 
  103: tls_cipher_openssl_suite_names(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  104:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_handshake:prop_tls_cipher_suite_openssl_name()).
  105:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_cipher_suite_openssl_name(),
  106:                                         Config).
  107: tls_anon_cipher_suite_names(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  108:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_cipher_suite_rfc_name()).
  109:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_anon_cipher_suite_rfc_name(),
  110:                                         Config).
  111: 
  112: tls_anon_cipher_openssl_suite_names(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  113:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_handshake:prop_tls_cipher_suite_openssl_name()).
  114:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_anon_cipher_suite_openssl_name(),
  115:                                         Config).
  116: 
  117: tls_signature_algs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  118:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_handshake:prop_tls_signature_algs()).
  119:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_cipher_format:prop_tls_signature_algs(),
  120:                                         Config).
  121: 
  122: tls_unorded_chains(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  123:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_ordered_path("/tmp")
  124:     ssl:start(),
  125:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  126:     true =  ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_unordered_path(PrivDir),
  127:                                         Config).
  128: 
  129: tls_extraneous_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  130:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_ordered_path("/tmp")
  131:     ssl:start(),
  132:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  133:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_extraneous_path(PrivDir),
  134:                                         Config).
  135: 
  136: tls_extraneous_chains(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  137:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_ordered_path()
  138:     ssl:start(),
  139:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_extraneous_paths(),
  140:                                        Config).
  141: tls_extraneous_and_unorder_chains(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  142:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_ordered_path()
  143:     ssl:start(),
  144:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_tls_extraneous_and_unordered_path(),
  145:                                        Config).
  146: 
  147: tls_client_cert_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  148:     %% manual test:  proper:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_client_cert_auth()
  149:     ssl:start(),
  150:     true = ct_property_test:quickcheck(ssl_eqc_chain:prop_client_cert_auth(),
  151:                                        Config).
